adding ECx estimation and interval to the model output plot

Source: R/drc_Helper.R
addECxCI.Rd

adding ECx estimation and interval to the model output plot

Usage

addECxCI(
  p = NULL,
  object,
  EDres = NULL,
  trend = "Decrease",
  endpoint = "ErC",
  respLev = c(10, 20, 50),
  textAjust.x = 0.1,
  textAjust.y = 0.05,
  useObsCtr = FALSE,
  d0 = NULL,
  textsize = 2,
  lineheight = 1,
  xmin = 0.05,
  ...
)

Arguments

p

model plot as ggplot2 output

object

fitted drc object

EDres

EDresults corresponding to respLev

trend

"Decrease" or "Increase"

endpoint

ErC or EbC or EyC or EC or LD

respLev

reponse levels

textAjust.x

where to label ECx

textAjust.y

where to label ECx

useObsCtr

whether to use observed control mean

d0

to be used control mean.

textsize

label text size

lineheight

errorbar height

xmin

when confidence intervals very wide including even negative values.

...
